titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the Lord-Mayor and aldermen at Guild-Hall chappel on Sunday the 11th of April being the anniversary of His Majesties coronation microform / by Sir William Dawes, Baronet ...
titleStmt.author: Dawes, William, Sir, 1671-1724.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
